mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.post AS "post", a.hr_text AS "hrText", a.lead_fst_text AS "leadFstText", a.lead_sec_text AS "leadSecText", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.files AS "files", a.project_id AS "project.id", a.user_id1 AS "userId1", a.user_id2 AS "userId2", a.user_id3 AS "userId3", u3.name AS "user.name", o4.name AS "office.name", p5.name AS "project.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o4 ON o4.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN oa_project p5 ON p5.id = a.project_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_project_cons( id, proc_ins_id, user_id, office_id, post, hr_text, lead_fst_text, lead_sec_text, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, files, project_id, user_id1, user_id2, user_id3 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{user.id}, #{office.id}, #{post}, #{hrText}, #{leadFstText}, #{leadSecText}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{files}, #{project.id}, #{userId1}, #{userId2}, #{userId3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_project_cons SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, user_id = #{user.id}, office_id = #{office.id}, post = #{post}, hr_text = #{hrText}, lead_fst_text = #{leadFstText}, lead_sec_text = #{leadSecText}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, files = #{files}, project_id = #{project.id}, user_id1 = #{userId1}, user_id2 = #{userId2}, user_id3 = #{userId3} WHERE id = #{id}
